public class studentController
extends java.lang.Object
Implementation of the studentcontroller class which calls methods from the filecontroller clas

    Method which determines whether student has access to the starsplanner system according to their access period

    static void printVacancy()
    Print the vacancies of a particular index
    static void printWaitlist​(java.lang.String name)
    Method to print the waitlisted indexes of a particular student
    static void registerCourse​(java.lang.String name)
    Method to handle the different situations when a student try to register himself to a course There can be successful registration, registered for the same course again, added to waitlist, reached the AU limits and possible clashes in schedule
    static void swopIndex​(java.lang.String name)
    Method which allows the student to swop indexes with another student
    static void updateEmail​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String newEmail)
    Method which allows student to update/change his email
    static void updatePassword​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String newPassword)

  • Method Details

    • isAccessPeriod

      public static boolean isAccessPeriod​(java.lang.String name)
      Method which determines whether student has access to the starsplanner system according to their access period
      Parameters:
      name - : name of the student
      Returns:
      :boolean value, where true represents student has access to the starsplanner system and false represents student does not have access to the system at this time

    • registerCourse

      public static void registerCourse​(java.lang.String name)
      Method to handle the different situations when a student try to register himself to a course There can be successful registration, registered for the same course again, added to waitlist, reached the AU limits and possible clashes in schedule
      Parameters:
      name - : name of the particular student

    • dropCourse

      public static void dropCourse​(java.lang.String name)
      Method which allows student to drop the index of a particular course
      Parameters:
      name - : name of this student

      Parameters:
      name - : name of this student

      name - : name of this student

      username - : login username of this student
      newPassword - : new password of this student

      newEmail - : new email of this student
